content.text: feat: Implement counter web app with button and UI

<reason>The frontend displays the application title and an error message indicating the counter could not be loaded. Since the backend is not implemented, it is expected to show this error. The UI components (text, button) seem correct and appropriate.</reason>
<answer>yes</answer>

<reason>The UI elements and layout are present and align with the prompt's requirements (counter app with a clean, modern UI). The "Failed to load counters" message and the "Retry" button are related to backend which is currently not implemented. The prompt is asking for the front-end, which is there.</reason>
<answer>yes</answer>

<reason>The frontend is correctly displaying the "Counter App" title, the "Failed to load counters" message, and a retry button, suggesting that the basic UI components are present. The errors in the console logs are all related to backend issues with loading and connecting to the server, which is not within the scope of validating the frontend code. </reason>
<answer>yes</answer>
